name: Bitser Password File
summary: Learn about .BPW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Each BPW may contain multiple logins and is saved using AES encryption. Each login includes a "Notes" field, which can be used to specify the purpose of the login, such as "Gmail," PayPal Account," or "Router." The list of logins can be viewed by clicking the "Passwords" tab, which opens the Password Manager.
NOTE: Login information can only be viewed after entering the Master Password for the BPW file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
